title: CSE ends on positive note after days of index drops
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Colombo Stock Exchange ended on a positive note with the All Share Price Index (ASPI) gaining 330.91 points and ending at 7611.43, and the S&P SL20 index up by 175.81 points and ending at 2,532.52 points.
Moreover, the turnover for the day is Rs. 2.98 billion while the share volume traded during the day being 140.22 million.
